info.description: REST interface for the Insights Platform Host Inventory application.
info.title: Insights Host Inventory REST Interface

get.description:
Read the entire list of all hosts available to the account.

Required permissions: inventory:hosts:read

parameters.description: A part of a searched host’s display name.
parameters.name: display_name

parameters.description: Search for a host by display_name, fqdn, id
parameters.name: hostname_or_id

parameters.description: Search for a host by insights_id
parameters.name: insights_id

get.summary: Read the entire list of hosts

post.description:
Create a new host and add it to the host list or update an existing hosts. A host is updated if there is already one with the same canonicals facts and belonging to the same account.

Required permissions: inventory:hosts:write

NOTICE: This operation is deprecated. The explicit creation of hosts is no longer supported. Hosts are created automatically based on uploads processed by the [payload ingress service](/docs/api/ingress#operations-default-post_upload) instead.

requestBody.description: A list of host objects to be added to the host list

post.summary: Create/update multiple host and add them to the host list

put.description:
Finds a host and updates its staleness timestamps. It uses the supplied canonical facts to determine which host to update. By default, the staleness timestamp is set to 1 hour from when the request is received; however, this can be overridden by supplying the interval.

Required permissions: inventory:hosts:write

requestBody.description: A list of host objects to be added to the host list

put.summary: Update staleness timestamps for a host matching the provided facts
